</body>***хитрить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хитрить.html>хитри́ть</a> (10895)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Perhaps from <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xítryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ить</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрить.html>хитри́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xitrítʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:схитрить.html>схитри́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to be sly/cunning/crafty, to try to fool</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xítryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitró</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xítro</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрость.html>хи́трость</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xítrostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрец.html>хитре́ц</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitréc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрец.html>хитреца́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitrecá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитринка (page does not exist)">хитринка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitrínka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитроумный.html>хитроу́мный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitroúmnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитроумие (page does not exist)">хитроумие</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitroúmije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">хитросплетение</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitrospleténije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:хит.html>хит</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>рить</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:схитрить.html>схитри́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-хитр-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:лукавить.html>лука́вить</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:темнить.html>темни́ть</a>, плутовать</li>

</body>***хитро.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a> (9442)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xítryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (stem-stressed variant) or from <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xítryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (ending-stressed variant).
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a></strong> <i>or</i> <strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xítro</span> <i>or</i> <span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xitró</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>slyly, cunningly</li>
<li>intricately, with cunning</li>
<li>adroitly</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a></strong> <i>or</i> <strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xítro</span> <i>or</i> <span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xitró</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">short neuter singular of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xítryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:хит.html>хит</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ро <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хит.html>хит</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ро</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>; неизменяемое.

</p>

</body>***хитрость.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хитрость.html>хи́трость</a> (6201)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?Title=Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/xytrost%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/xytrostь (page does not exist)">*xytrostь</a></i>, from <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*xytrъ</i> + <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*-ostь</i>. Synchronically analysable as <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xítryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ость</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрость.html>хи́трость</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xítrostʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрость.html>хи́трости</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрость.html>хи́трости</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрость.html>хи́тростей</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>craftiness, craft <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">shrewdness</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li>ruse</li>
<li>stratagem</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:хит.html>хит</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>рость</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 3-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 8a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-хитр-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ость</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йство</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нию</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>прилага́тельного</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></i> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:притворство.html>притво́рство</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:лукавый.html>лука́вая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:изворотливость.html>изворо́тливость</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</body>***хитроумный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хитроумный.html>хитроу́мный</a> (10871)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xítryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ум.html>ум</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">um</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитроумный.html>хитроу́мный</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xitroúmnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>cunning, resourceful, crafty, artful</li>
<li>intricate, sophisticated
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:хитроумный.html>хитроу́мное</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:устройство.html>устро́йство</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>xitroúmnoje</b> ustrójstvo</i> ― <span class="e-translation">sophisticated device</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>ingenious, smart</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитроумие (page does not exist)">хитроумие</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitroúmije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xítryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitró</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хитро</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xítro</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрость.html>хи́трость</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xítrostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрить.html>хитри́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitrítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:схитрить.html>схитри́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">sxitrítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрец.html>хитре́ц</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitréc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрец.html>хитреца́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitrecá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитринка (page does not exist)">хитринка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitrínka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:хит.html>хит</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ро<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ум.html>ум</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 1*a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> | — <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитроумнее (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">хитроумнее</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитроумней (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">хитроумней</a>.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-хитр-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-ум-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a>, плутоватый, <a href = vnd.unilang:лукавый.html>лука́вый</a></li>

</body>***хитрый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a> (3076)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8Aamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хытръ (page does not exist)">хытръ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xytrŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*xytrъ</i>. Cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Bulgarian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Bulgarian language">Bulgarian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="bg">хитър</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Bg-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">hitǎr</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">sly</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Serbo-Croatian" class="extiw" title="w:Serbo-Croatian">Serbo-Croatian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="sh">хитар</i>/<i class="Latn mention" lang="sh">hitar</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">hasty</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, Slovak and Czech <i class="Latn mention" lang="cs">chytrý</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">clever</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трый</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xítryj</span>) (<i>comparative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="похитрее (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитрее (page does not exist)">хитрее</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="похитрей (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитрей (page does not exist)">хитрей</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>sly, cunning, artful</li>
<li>intricate, involved
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>Э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <b>хитро/хитро</b>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Éto ne <b>xítro/xitró</b>.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">That's simple.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>Э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дело.html>дело</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрый.html>хи́трое</a></b>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Éto délo ne <b>xítroje</b>.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">It is very simple; A child could do it.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>skilful, resourceful</li></ol>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрить.html>хитри́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xitrítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:схитрить.html>схитри́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">sxitrítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хитрость.html>хи́трость</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xítrostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:хит.html>хит</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>рый</b>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хихикать.html>хихи́кать</a> (8437)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хихикать.html>хихи́кать</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xixíkatʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хихикнуть.html>хихи́кнуть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to giggle, to chuckle, to snigger, to titter <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">laugh</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b>хи<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>хи<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>кать</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:хихикнуть.html>хихи́кнуть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-хи-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-хи-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ка</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li> <a href = vnd.unilang:смеяться.html>смея́ться</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тихо.html>ти́хо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:исподтишка.html>исподтишка́</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</body>***хихикнуть.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хихикнуть.html>хихи́кнуть</a> (9827)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хихикнуть.html>хихи́кнуть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xixíknutʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хихикать.html>хихи́кать</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to giggle, to chuckle, to snigger, to titter <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">laugh</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хищник.html>хи́щник</a> (7641)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хищник.html>хи́щник</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xíščnik</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хищник.html>хи́щника</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хищник.html>хи́щники</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хищник.html>хи́щников</a></b>, <i>feminine</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хищница (page does not exist)">хищница</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>predator <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">any animal or other organism</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хищный.html>хи́щный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xíščnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><b>хищ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ник</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-хищ-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ник</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хищный.html>хищно</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xíščno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">short neuter singular of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хищный.html>хи́щный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xíščnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

</body>***хищный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хищный.html>хи́щный</a> (9909)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хитить (page does not exist)">хитить</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xititʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to plunder, to reave</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хищный.html>хи́щный</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xíščnyj</span>) (<i>comparative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="похищнее (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хищнее (page does not exist)">хищнее</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="похищней (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="хищней (page does not exist)">хищней</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>predatory</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b>хищ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 1*a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-хищ-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B8%D1%89%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</body>***хладнокровие.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хладнокровие.html>хладнокро́вие</a> (16272)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">хладный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xládnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:кровь.html>кровь</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">krovʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ие</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, a calque of  <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language">French</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr">sang-froid</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хладнокровие.html>хладнокро́вие</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xladnokróvije</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хладнокровие.html>хладнокро́вия</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хладнокровие.html>хладнокро́вия</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хладнокровие.html>хладнокро́вий</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>sang-froid, composure <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">coolness in trying circumstances</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>хлад<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>кро<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ви<span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-хлад-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; интерфикс: <b>-о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-кров-</b>; суффикс: <b>-иj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-е</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</p>
<ol><li>coolly, cold-bloodedly, in cold blood</li></ol>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хладнокровный.html>хладнокро́вный</a> (18902)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">хладнокров(ие)</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xladnokróv(ije)</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хладнокровный.html>хладнокро́вный</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xladnokróvnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>calm, cool</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">figuratively</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> cold-blooded <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">act, etc.</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хлам.html>хлам</a> (9937)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BCamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлам.html>хлам</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xlam</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлам.html>хла́ма</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлам.html>хла́мы</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлам.html>хла́мов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>trash, rubbish</li>
<li>cruft, junk</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BCamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

</body>***хлеб.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеб</a> (677)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1amp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">хлѣбъ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xlěbŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*xlěbъ</i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Germanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Germanic language">Proto-Germanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro">*hlaibaz</i>, of unknown origin.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1amp;action=editamp;section=10" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеб</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xleb</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеба</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хле́бы</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлебов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>bread</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">figuratively</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> living
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:фотография.html>фотогра́фия</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:мой.html>мой</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеб</a></b></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">fotográfija — moj <b>xleb</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">photography is my living</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>loaf</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Saint_Petersburg" class="extiw" title="w:Saint Petersburg">Saint Petersburg</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> black bread</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_3">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1amp;action=editamp;section=13" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеб</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xleb</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеба</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеба</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлебов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>grain</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нии</a> <i>булочное <a href = vnd.unilang:изделие.html>изде́лие</a></i>:
</p>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеб</a></b> | (<span title="<a href = vnd.unilang:написание.html>написа́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> дореформенной орфографии" style="border-bottom: 1px dotted; cursor: help">дореформ.</span> <span style="font-family: | Palatino Linotype | ">хлѣбъ</span>)
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).

<li>,  <i><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> кожевников</i>: <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BA%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%81%D1%8Bamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:квас.html>квасы́</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)"><a href = vnd.unilang:квас.html>квасы́</a></a>, брожёный <a href = vnd.unilang:затор.html>зато́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> выделки <a href = vnd.unilang:шкура.html>шку́р</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:кожа.html>Ко́жи</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлебах</a></span>, ещё <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлебов</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выйти.html>вы́шли</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> <span style="font-size:smaller; color:darkgreen;"><a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>Цита́та</a> взята <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikisource.org/wiki/%D0%A2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%8C_%D0%92._%D0%94%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8F" class="extiw" title="s:<a href = vnd.unilang:толковый.html>Толко́вый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:словарь.html>слова́рь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. <head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хлебать.html>хлеба́ть</a> (10767)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><span class="maintenance-line" style="color: 777777;">(This etymology is missing or incomplete. Please add to it, or discuss it at the Etymology scriptorium.)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлебать.html>хлеба́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xlebátʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлебнуть.html>хлебну́ть</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="похлебать (page does not exist)">похлебать</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to eat (liquid food with a spoon), to slurp</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to gulp down, to drink</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b>хле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:батя.html>бать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:хлебнуть.html>хлебну́ть</a>.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:хлебец.html>хле́бец</a> (24460)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%86amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеб</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xleb</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ец</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ec</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%86amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлебец.html>хле́бец</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">xlébec</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлебец.html>хле́бца</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлебец.html>хле́бцы</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлебец.html>хле́бцев</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">endearing diminutive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеб</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">xleb</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: small loaf of bread</li>
<li>type of pastry <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">especially a buttery croissant</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%86amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеб</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xleb</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хлебный.html>хле́бный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xlébnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">хлебница</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xlébnica</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%86amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>хле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>бец</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 5*a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-хлеб-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ец</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
